Class LREvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • LREvent

  • public class LREvent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to consolidate information from one or more elements of the Match class and to generate the text of a Live Report Original Post. This class makes use of the methods in Match to get data together.

    This class is immutable.

    Made for MHacks - Fall 2013

    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    packrat386

      • genThread

        public java.lang.String genThread()
        Returns a string that ought to general a functioning original post on teamliquid.net using their BBcode. The string contains information about the tournament, the players their teams, the matches and format, the streams, and an area to update the results.
        Returns:
        The thread String that contains the entire threads information
